casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Shawn D. McLAURIN. No. 427P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 6, 2005. Kathleen U. Baldwin, Assistant Attorney General, Michael Parker, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th day of August 2005 by Defendant for "Petition for Discretionary Review Under G.S. 7A-31":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of October 2005."
